title: About the Reckless Girl Who Kept Challenging a Reborn Man Like Me - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Age Progression   Alternate World   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Clingy Lover   Devoted Love Interests   Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Day   Oneshot   Past Trauma   Philosophical   Previous Life Talent   Rivalry   Second Chance   Short Story   Time Skip   Tomboyish Female Lead
author: Kohigashi Nora   小東のら
description:
“A prodigy at ten, a genius at fifteen, a common man past twenty.”

This is a story of the struggle of an ordinary guy like me who is a “reincarnator” and a reckless and promising girl who is a “genius”.>
